question: What will be the price of Bitcoin (BTC/USD) at 6:01 AM UTC on December 12, 2025?
description: A 5-minute test market for Bitcoin price prediction. Current price is approximately $92,448. This market will resolve in 5 minutes.
resolutionCriteria:
This market resolves using the Bitcoin (BTC/USD) price reported by CoinGecko at exactly 06:01:48 UTC on December 12, 2025.

Resolution process:
• Price will be fetched from CoinGecko API at the exact resolution time
• The final price will be rounded to the nearest dollar for settlement
• Only the CoinGecko API (https://api.coingecko.com/api/v3/simple/price?ids=bitcoin&vs_currencies=usd) will be used as the authoritative data source
• Market range: $89,950 - $94,950 (100 buckets × $50)
